attributes.action: Replace school uniform with regular clothing and a dress code.
attributes.additional_details: Many students spend alot of money on uniform they grow out of in a years time, and with the uniform they can't express who they are. However, if they got to choose what clothing they could wear, they'd be able to express themselves better and feel more free.
attributes.background: Replace school uniform with regular clothing that students can wear with a dress code to stop inappropriate clothing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban school uniforms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701824
